ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 11
ygData.msgSnippet: Lets get this out and in the open now: ALL BOOKS for RESEARCH are written on OLD ERUDIAN.  Not Erudian but Old Erudian. I get mine in Neriak. From the Wizzard
ygData.messageBody:
Lets get this out and in the open now:

ALL BOOKS for RESEARCH are written on OLD ERUDIAN. Not Erudian but Old
Erudian.

I get mine in Neriak.

From the Wizzard Guild

Shadair
14th Wizzard
Karana

(back to 14 after last night crash episode on Karana)
(Gotta hate getting respawned right in front of a Hill Giant and then a
Werewolf)

----- Original Message -----
From: Crowder, David <DCrowder@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:22 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Digest Number 11


> From: "Crowder, David" <DCrowder@...>
>
> I was hoping that one of you could shed some light on research, such as:
>
> 1. What language is the wizards tome in?
>
> 2. Where near Freeport can you find a lexicon
>
> 3. what are the best places to find the desired scroll making components?
>
>
> I know this is a tall order, thanks in advance for trying
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Has ONElist changed your life?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> Visit our homepage and share with us your experiences at ONElist of the
Week!
